title: Terminal.app
description: Enable Secure Keyboard Entry in Terminal.app. Enabling Secure Keyboard Entry minimizes the risk of a key logger from detecting what is entered in Terminal

SecureKeyboardEntry.title: Enable Secure Keyboard Entry in Terminal.app
SecureKeyboardEntry.description: Set to true to enable Secure Keyboard Entry. Secure Keyboard Entry prevents other applications on the system and/or network from detecting and recording what is typed into Terminal.
